title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 point is earned: For any two correct rays through the lens

Two of the three principal rays shown on the diagram above were expected. One point was subtracted for additional incorrect rays. No credit was awarded for reflected rays.

1 point is earned: For correct extension of the rays backward

1 point is earned: For showing the image with correct size, position, and orientation

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For stating that the image is virtual, or for stating a choice consistent with the ray diagram in part (a)

If there were no supporting diagrams or calculations, virtual was the only accepted answer.

1 point is earned: For a correct explanation consistent with the choice given, such as:

The light rays diverge on the left side of the lens, but appear to come from a point behind the object. OR The image is on the same side of the lens as the object. OR The object is placed between the converging lens and the focal point. 1 point This point was not awarded if additional wrong statements were part of the response.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned : For the lens equation OR for the lens equation with substituted quantities

1 s 0 + 1 s i = 1 f OR 1 s 1 = 1 10cm − 1 6cm MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca aIXaaabaGaam4CamaaBaaaleaacaaIWaaabeaaaaGccqGHRaWkdaWc aaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaWGZbWaaSbaaSqaaiaadMgaaeqaaaaakiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaadAgaaaGaam4taiaadkfadaWcaaqa aiaaigdaaeaacaWGZbWaaSbaaSqaaiaaigdaaeqaaaaakiabg2da9m aalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaigdacaaIWaGaam4yaiaad2gaaaGaeyOe I0YaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaGOnaiaadogacaWGTbaaaaaa@4CFB@

2 points are earned : For the correct solution

s i = -15 cm (Minus sign was not necessary to receive full credit.)

Only 1 of the 2 answer points was awarded for the correct number without units.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned : For the correct image size to object size ratio with no units, or with units that cancel

h i h 0 = s i s 0 = 15cm 6cm = 5 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca WGObWaaSbaaSqaaiaadMgaaeqaaaGcbaGaamiAamaaBaaaleaacaaI WaaabeaaaaGccqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaadohadaWgaaWcbaGaamyAaa qabaaakeaacaWGZbWaaSbaaSqaaiaaicdaaeqaaaaakiabg2da9maa laaabaGaaGymaiaaiwdacaWGJbGaamyBaaqaaiaaiAdacaWGJbGaam yBaaaacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaaiwdaaeaacaaIYaaaaaaa@489F@

Notes: Students could use either a calculation or a ray diagram to arrive at the final answer.

1 point only was awarded if the correct ratio was imbedded in extra calculations or if units were provided for the answer (for example, 2.5 cm).

No points were given for giving the object size to image size ratio.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Since the question asked for a description, a verbal response was expected, although the image position, size, and orientation could be determined from either a calculation or a ray diagram

1 points are earned: For the correct position: Image on the opposite side of the lens from the object

1 points are earned: For distance from the image to the lens in the range 20 cm ± 3 cm

1 points are earned: For the correct size: image size same as object size, or for size consistent with value for position

1 points are earned: For the correct orientation: image is inverted
